mapper.insert: insert into board (content, created, userId, placeId, placeScore) values (#{content}, sysdate(), #{userId}, #{placeId}, #{placeScore})
mapper.update: update board set content = #{content} where boardId = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: insert into my_place (widthCoordinate, heightCoordinate, address, jibunAddress, category, name, imgPath, placeInfo, userId) values (#{widthCoordinate}, #{heightCoordinate}, #{address}, #{jibunAddress}, #{category}, #{name}, #{imgPath}, #{placeInfo}, #{userId})
